title: Pregnant Ashley Graham dressed up as a 'knocked up' Jessica Rabbit in skintight latex dress for Halloween
text:
Ashley Graham (pictured in September) didn't let her pregnancy get in the way of her Halloween costume. (Photo: Kevin Mazur/Getty Images for Savage X Fenty Show Presented by Amazon Prime Video )





She may be well into her first pregnancy, but Ashley Graham wasn’t about to settle for an oversized maternity costume this Halloween. While baby bumps have long been transformed into basketballs and or concealed underneath bulbous ensembles — see Heidi Klum’s past glory as the apple that tempted Eve — Graham put hers front and center as she squeezed into a skintight red latex dress for her sexy Jessica Rabbit costume.

Oozing “I’m not bad, I’m just drawn that way” sex appeal, the body-positive model vamped in a flame-red wig, accessorizing with opera-length purple gloves and the ultimate mama-to-be must-have: comfortable sneakers.

Graham’s other plus-one, husband Justin Ervin, meanwhile, dressed up as the late wrestler Randy “Macho Man” Savage, complete with lace-up boots and large championship belt. The costume also prompted Graham to quip, “Macho Man knocked up Jessica Rabbit for Halloween” in her Instagram caption.

So just how did the beauty pull off that slinky latex look? According to her response to a commenter, she used another new mom staple to lubricate the dress so she could slip it on: baby powder.

She should be a pro by now. Graham also rocked a bump-hugging red latex dress in September for New York Fashion Week.

description: The mom-to-be showed off her baby bump in a red latex dress paired with comfy sneakers.
